subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Most Haunted & The Box
author: psfponies
full_text:
--0-1506700482-1223744152=:14531
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I watched some of Most Haunted Live Gettysburg last night they were using a Minibox. You really couldnt hear the answers live but they repeated what was being said. It was pretty cool. At least the people using the mini box were amazed!

Kay



--- On Fri, 10/10/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Most Haunted & The Box
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, October 10, 2008, 9:54 PM

Hi April,

Cool news!  I'll make sure to tune in.  It's always good when the 
sweeping band boxes get in the news or on the TV and radio.

Is this the prototype that sweeps the AM, and a bit above and below 
that band?

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Slaughter"
<aprilrebuilt@...> 
wrote:
>
> Just thought I would drop in to let you all know that Dr. Ciaran
> O'Keeffe has borrowed a Mini from our team (the initial prototype) and
> will be using it tonight during part of their investigation in
> Gettysburg. It is a LIVE event tonight on the Travel Channel beginning
> at 8 p.m. EST. It will be interesting to see what they catch with the
> box, if anything! :)
>



------------------------------------

Yahoo! Groups Links
